title: Stage Lv6-P3-S14
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I had known about the meeting, I would have prepared better.
Had she studied harder, she could have passed the exam.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 회의에 대해 알았다면 더 잘 준비했을 텐데.
sentences.en: If I had known about the meeting, I would have prepared better.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 더 열심히 공부했었다면 시험에 합격할 수 있었을 텐데.
sentences.en: Had she studied harder, she could have passed the exam.

sentences.kr: 우리가 더 일찍 투자했었다면 더 많은 수익을 올렸을 텐데.
sentences.en: If we had invested earlier, we would have made more profit.

sentences.kr: 그 정보를 미리 받았었다면 다른 결정을 내렸을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If I had received that information earlier, I would have made a different decision.

sentences.kr: 팀이 더 잘 소통했었다면 프로젝트가 성공했을 텐데.
sentences.en: Had the team communicated better, the project would have succeeded.

sentences.kr: 날씨가 좋았었다면 행사를 연기하지 않았을 텐데.
sentences.en: If the weather had been good, we wouldn't have postponed the event.

sentences.kr: 그가 조언을 들었었다면 실수를 피할 수 있었을 텐데.
sentences.en: If he had listened to the advice, he could have avoided the mistake.

sentences.kr: 회사가 시장 변화를 예측했었다면 더 잘 대응했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had the company predicted market changes, it would have responded better.
